name: The Summoning of the Boglord: A Cautionary Tale about Rhythmic Frogs, and the Cost of Hubris
name_original: The Summoning of the Boglord: A Cautionary Tale about Rhythmic Frogs, and the Cost of Hubris
description:
Within the fetid swamps of Fr'ogg, The Golden Lilypad begins the final preparations for the greatest ritual of the age: The Summoning of The Bogmaster. You are a recently recruited acolyte, and have been chosen to assist the elders in the completion of the rite. The ritual is so complex, that even the rhythm must be exact. If you fail... who knows cruel fate may befall you. 

This is a rhythm game about a cult of frogs! 

(This game is pretty broken, we are full of hubris for trying to make a rhythm game for our first jam.)

Built for the Mini Jam 108: Sacrifice!

Controls:

Use [F] and [J] to hit the beats!
